name: Mushroom Quest
description: Rethinking of the classic sokoban genre, slow and kind game with original gameplay elements. Mushroom Quest is a retro styled and addictive arcade, ideal to spend few unhurried evenings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: 1.8 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
